com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.map.test

Class MapTestDisplay

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.map.MapDisplay
      • com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.map.test.MapTestDisplay
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Tickable, MapDisplayEvents

    public class MapTestDisplay
extends MapDisplay
    A map display that renders colored tiles with text in them to denote the coordinates. Can be used to debug map display tiling performance.
